general.text: This small remote-controlled device was designed specifically for catching vermin. Would you like to use it now?
Something used to be kept in here but it seems to have escaped when the capsule was damaged.
It’s a solar panel from the Hubble Space Telescope. It’s like owning a piece of history though you probably wish that this particular piece of history wasn’t jutting through your capsule’s hull.
This machine monitors the equipment used in the room. It tells you that there are many problems and that you should probably fix them.
This is a ladder. It leads upstairs to the other rooms inside the capsule. What would you like to do?
